definition: double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.
sentences.chinese: 微电铸工艺兼具掩膜电镀和厚膜结构电铸的双重特征。

sentences.english: Hoshikawa is like these three characters in one.
sentences.chinese: 星川兼具这三个角色的优点。

sentences.english: A Beijing Cultural Tours Manual in multiple languages shall be published.
sentences.chinese: 印制兼具中外文的《北京文化旅游手册》。

sentences.english: The beet webworm, Loxostege sticticalis Linnaeus (Lepidoptera: Pyralidae), is a serious pest to farming and stockbreeding in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 草地螟是一种兼具迁飞和滞育特性的重要农业害虫。

sentences.english: In ancient China, there was an open and super-stable reading system.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代社会有一个兼具开放性与超稳定的阅读系统。

sentences.english: It inculcates purity and harmony, the mystery of mutual charity, the romanticism of the social order.
sentences.chinese: 茶道主张纯净和谐，仁慈互爱，兼具秩序与浪漫。

sentences.english: Anatomically, the species shows a mix of primitive and advanced traits.
sentences.chinese: 从解剖学上说，这个物种兼具原始和发达的特征。

sentences.english: Remote control float valve is a hydraulic operation valve with multiple functions.
sentences.chinese: 进口遥控浮球阀是兼具多种功能的水力操作式阀门。

sentences.english: The national adjustment power shows both the characteristics of public rights and private rights.
sentences.chinese: 国家调节权兼具公权和私权特点。

sentences.english: It is a curtain, a room divider and a bookshelf all in one. [link]
sentences.chinese: 这是一个兼具窗帘，房屋分割器等功能的书架。

sentences.english: Small &large diameter fibres combine to provide superior dirt & water removal .
sentences.chinese: 独特大小纤维结构，兼具除污及吸水双重效能。

sentences.english: Elfloving creations of stunning elegance and captivating originality.
sentences.chinese: 伊芙洛林的作品兼具极致典雅与迷人创意。

sentences.english: Beauty has double characteristics both in appearance and in immanence.
sentences.chinese: 美兼具外在美与内在美的双重特性。

sentences.english: Is it a product or a pattern or both?
sentences.chinese: 它是一种产品还是一种模式，或者二者兼具？

sentences.english: The bio-diesel is a clean energy with environmental friendly and sustainable development feature.
sentences.chinese: 生质柴油是一项兼具环保友善及永续发展的洁净能源。

sentences.english: He was a man of much ability, and was both active and industrious;
sentences.chinese: 金恩很有能力，兼具活跃和勤勉的品质。

definition: to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to exist at the same time/to coexist
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
to lay equal stress on/to pay equal attention to
